title: Jane and the Magician
description: A feisty heroine who’d rather joust than sew seeks out her own adventures in these magical fairy tales for today’s young readers.The king is giving a party to cheer up the prince, so he sends Jane and her friend the dragon to find his missing magician. But what they find is a problem — a very wet and watery problem. Will the prince’s party be a washout? Or can Jane find a magical solution?
author: Martin Baynton
